channel.title: Help! cant tele during duel even after the duel is over
channel.description: Hi, im using InsidiaX as a source, and when your dueling it is set so you cant teleport out, which is good and how I want it to be, but even after you die and the duel has ended is still registers you as if you are in a duel, so you can not teleport until you log out and log back in. If anyone can help me with this it would be greatly appreciated. Thank you.

item.title: Help! cant tele during duel even after the duel is over
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

tigman9:

Hi, im using InsidiaX as a source, and when your dueling it is set so you cant teleport out, which is good and how I want it to be, but even after you die and the duel has ended is still registers you as if you are in a duel, so you can not teleport until you log out and log back in. If anyone can help me with this it would be greatly appreciated. Thank you.

It only does this when you click to attack the other player once the player is dead.

Read full topic
item.source: Help! cant tele during duel even after the duel is over

item.title: Help! cant tele during duel even after the duel is over
item.dc:creator: @tigman9 tigman9
item.description:
@tigman9 wrote:

im not really sure where that would be, this is when it sends the message, would it have anything to do with that? I went through my tradeandduel file and i dont think there was anything about respawning,
} else if(c.duelStatus == 5){
c.sendMessage(“You can’t teleport during a duel!”);

Read full topic

item.title: Help! cant tele during duel even after the duel is over

item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Add an if statement around the Dueling methods that handle the respawn.
